description:
Travel management company AEROCLUB (business travel services, MICE, aircraft charter) opens a vacancy “Floater/corporate travel expert”.

Responsibilities:

  • Replacement of travel agents at the key client’s offices.
  • Clients Support: reservation and issuance of air and railway tickets, booking hotels, cars, additional services.

Candidate profile:

  • Higher education.
  • English knowledge – intermediate level.
  • More than 2 years experience as a travel agent.
  • Good knowledge of GDS systems (Amadeus, Sirena).
  • Good communication skills
  • Active person, result-oriented
  • Ability to work under pressure.

Compensation package will be discussed with a successful candidate.

We propose for  new employees participation in «travel management trainee» program which includes courses of hotel bookings and railway tickets  reservations.
name: Floater/corporate travel expert
